author: Brenda Goodman
title: As BA.2 subvariant of Omicron rises, lab studies point to signs of severity - CNN
description: The BA.2 virus -- a subvariant of the Omicron coronavirus variant -- isn't just spreading faster than its distant cousin, it may also cause more severe disease and appears capable of thwarting some of the key weapons we have against Covid-19, new research sug…
